com.netflix.zuul.stats.monitoring

Class MonitorRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.zuul.stats.monitoring.MonitorRegistry

  • public class MonitorRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Registry to register a Counter. a Monitor publisher should be set to get counter information. If it isn't set, registration will be ignored.
